com.bham.bd.components

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.BaseGameEntity
      • com.bham.bd.components.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Services
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SurvivalController

    public abstract class Controller
extends BaseGameEntity
implements Services
    Class defining the common elements and behavior for any controller

      • setMode

        public static void setMode(MapType mapType)
        Sets the mode of the game the user has chosen
        Parameters:
        mapType - layout of map that will be used

      • loadGame

        protected abstract void loadGame(MapType mapType)
        Loads and starts the game

        Loads the game by providing the type of map to load. It initializes the player and any additional tools, such map division and graph.

        Parameters:
        mapType - type of map the game will be played on

      • getHitBox

        public Rectangle getHitBox()
        Description copied from class: BaseGameEntity
        Gets the hit-box of the entity

        Hit-box is a shape with size and location properties. In most cases it is either a circle or a rectangle.

        Specified by:
        getHitBox in class BaseGameEntity
        Returns:
        the shape of the hit-box

      • getHitBoxRadius

        public double getHitBoxRadius()
        Description copied from class: BaseGameEntity
        Gets the outer radius of the hit-box

        If it's a circle it gets its radius, if its any other shape, it gets the radius of the outer circle that would be generated around the hit-box.

        Specified by:
        getHitBoxRadius in class BaseGameEntity
        Returns:
        size of hit-box radius

        Parameters:
